text: Chief, I'm sorry. Excuse me for a moment.
Your number was listed as the emergency contact, so I called you.
There seems to be an issue with my father-in-law.
[press secretary] Oh no. Then you should hurry.
Use my official vehicle. They'll get you there quickly and safely.
Why are they coming towards us?
Hello. Thank you for your hard work.
I'll come to the station to file the report.
I'm sorry, but what's your relationship with her?
-My wife gave this case to me. -He's Paik Sa-eon.
I have a favor to ask.
I'll visit as soon as I can to file the report.
In the meantime, please keep our personal information private.
-Don't do it. Don't. -I also have a favor to ask.
I know this isn't the greatest situation,
but may I get a picture with you?
I'll take a picture with you at the station.
Anyway, we should move him to a different nursing home.
How could he go so far?
you don't have to worry about your father.
[softly] You look so ugly right now.
I'm not telling you to stop crying.
Cry as much as you want.
One tteokbokki set with gimbap, fish cakes, and sundae with the entrails.
I'm just happy to see you.
You get prettier by the day.
-[Sang-woo] Are you just getting off work? -[You-ri] My goodness.

Did you come hoping to run into me?
We're visiting a site together in a few days! [giggles]
This is one serving for me.
That day at the French restaurant, it didn't even make a dent in my stomach.

You said you've been through unrequited love like a fan before.

Actually, I was so scared of him.

Yes, a bill must be prepared through National Assembly discussions.
Then, what could be realistic regulatory measures?
First, we should reduce plastic use and use tumblers instead of disposables.
That would be more of an individual effort and a recommendation.

are there no concrete solutions prepared?
He's breaking in a new recruit again. [chuckles]
Come in by two o'clock from tomorrow.
You mean, two o'clock in the morning?
If you're to run it by me for review, learn how to write it, and practice,
An anchor isn't a parrot that simply reads off a script.
Plus, for the morning news, you should come in by two to remove facial swelling.
Look at your face now. You look like a soggy steamed bun.
but he was a good colleague who taught me a lot.
he quit his job and got appointed as spokesperson.

His grandfather's a bigwig who's done everything except for the presidency.
His father's a strong presidential candidate.
His relatives are former or current ministers,
Naturally, he married the daughter of a very influential family.
The eldest daughter of Chairman Hong of Chungwoon Daily News.
Did you just remember what day it is today?
Wash your face. And blow your nose too.
I have to stay focused from now on.
I want us to have a conversation.
someone's been messing with us lately.
and even your father's nursing home this time.

So before that happens, tell me if you're hiding anything.
I could keep pressuring you until I force it out of you, but…
We're not close enough to interfere
Eat this and rest. Come down afterward. I'll go first.
You haven't settled from the shock yet.
You know you'll be very tense down there.
Don't overdo it. Just do as I say.
It shouldn't just be another regular meal today, right?
Didn't the aides make a plan?
I don't need a grand plan for this.
Just beat him until he obeys.
I only have an hour to spare.
Didn't you have something to say to me?
A special on presidential candidates. Just anyone does it these days.
You know, cooking, dancing, and singing.
and even their dogs and cats to promote themselves.
The only thing I can boast about is my son.
Have you still not heard from your sister?
You know, I really think Chairman Hong tricked me.
He never intended to give us his eldest daughter in the first place.
He's scared I might lose the election.
That's why he sent his flawed daughter as a stand-in.
Even if you were a bargain, you should be able to earn your keep.
There's a paparazzi taking pictures of guests here.
"Spokesperson Paik Sa-eon meets with his father, Paik Ui-yong, for dinner."
Is that the headline you wanted?
I'll decide whether or not to participate in your election.
Do you know what will happen if you keep acting like this?
The moment you step out of my shadow, you could get crushed completely.
Do you really think I'm still in there?
I know you'd do anything to get me to surrender.
-So the thought crossed my mind. -What are you talking about?
You're at the threshold of being president, thanks to Grandfather.
The least you could do is step over it on your own.
and ask me to push you.
You married me in place of your missing sister and can't speak.
So you can't even defend yourself when your in-laws spout nonsense.
They're people who can easily replace their children.
don't listen to them or take it to heart.

He said the blood analysis results confirmed animal blood and fake teeth.
Also, I have a personal request.
-[static over radio] -[kidnapper] No backing out in the middle.
You can do this! Good luck! You got this!
If our families find out I'm working beside you…

how you're going to handle the aftermath if I get the job.

all citizens must unite in caring for and educating children.

when you set your articulation points, I studied that a lot in particular.
from the sounds your tongue makes against the roof of your mouth.

can you not speak at all?
so she passed the document review.

how will you communicate with the spokesperson's team?

whether we interpreters are conveying your message properly.

if they had been more honest

like how a mind game is played,
